roleset.name: add an amino group to a compound
roleset.note: AMINATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.

example.name: aminate-v: active use
example.text: Here, we aminated silica nanoparticles as an example.

example.name: aminate-v: passive use, with result
example.text: In Step 3, [5-amino-1-naphthol]-1 is aminated *-1 to produce 1,5-diaminonaphthalene.

example.name: aminate-v: passive use, with instrument
example.text: []The carbohydrate components]-1 were re-N-acetylated and then reductively aminated *-1 with 2-aminopyridine.

example.name: amination-n
example.text: Sodium triacetoxyborohydride is presented as a general reducing agent for the reductive amination of aldehydes and ketones.
